title: On the Trail of the Lost Artifact
exposition: You're an intrepid archaeologist on the hunt for a legendary artifact rumored to hold unimaginable power. As you journey through ancient ruins and perilous jungles, you must make crucial decisions to uncover the truth.

answers.title: Explore the Temple Ruins
answers.description: Amongst the overgrown ruins, you find a crumbling statue with a faint inscription. 'The path to the artifact lies through the heart of the temple,' it seems to whisper.

answers.title: Venture into the Deep Jungle
answers.description: The jungle is dense and teeming with life. Strange markings on trees catch your eye, possibly indicating a hidden path.

temple-ruins.exposition: As you delve deeper into the temple ruins, you encounter a fork in the path. Which way will you go?

answers.title: Follow the Dark Corridor
answers.description: The dark corridor seems ominous, but perhaps it leads to the heart of the temple where the artifact awaits.

answers.title: Ascend the Crumbling Stairs
answers.description: The crumbling stairs may be treacherous, but they offer a glimpse of sunlight filtering through the foliage above.

temple-heart.exposition: Congratulations! You've reached the heart of the temple. Before you lies the legendary artifact, gleaming with an otherworldly light. What will you do?

answers.title: Claim the Artifact
answers.description: You reach out and claim the artifact, feeling its power coursing through you. But with great power comes great responsibility...

answers.title: Leave the Artifact
answers.description: You hesitate, unsure of the consequences of claiming such a powerful artifact. You decide to leave it behind and continue your journey.

deep-jungle.exposition: As you navigate through the dense jungle, you hear strange noises in the distance. What will you do?

answers.title: Press Onward
answers.description: You steel yourself and press onward, determined to uncover the secrets hidden within the jungle.

answers.title: Retreat and Regroup
answers.description: The jungle is unforgiving, and it may be wise to retreat and regroup before continuing your journey.

dark-corridor.exposition: The dark corridor seems endless, but you press on. Suddenly, you come face to face with a deadly trap! What will you do?

answers.title: Attempt to Disarm the Trap
answers.description: You carefully attempt to disarm the trap, hoping to continue your journey safely.

answers.title: Retreat and Find Another Path
answers.description: The trap is too dangerous to risk triggering. You retreat to find another path through the temple ruins.

crumbling-stairs.exposition: As you ascend the crumbling stairs, you hear a loud rumbling noise. What will you do?

answers.title: Press Onward
answers.description: You press onward, determined to reach the top of the stairs and uncover the secrets that await.

answers.title: Retreat to Safety
answers.description: The stairs are collapsing around you! You retreat to safety just in time, narrowly avoiding disaster.

press-onward.exposition: As you press onward through the jungle, you stumble upon a hidden clearing. What will you do?

answers.title: Investigate the Clearing
answers.description: The clearing may hold clues to your quest. You investigate further, hoping to uncover valuable information.

answers.title: Continue Forward
answers.description: You press forward, determined to stay focused on your ultimate goal of finding the artifact.

retreat-regroup.exposition: As you retreat from the jungle, you stumble upon a hidden cave entrance. What will you do?

answers.title: Explore the Cave
answers.description: The cave may offer shelter and perhaps even clues to aid you on your journey. You decide to explore its depths.

answers.title: Leave the Jungle
answers.description: You decide to leave the jungle for now and regroup at your base camp before planning your next move.

trap-outcome.exposition: You carefully disarm the trap and continue down the dark corridor. Suddenly, you reach a dead end! What will you do?

answers.title: Search for a Hidden Passage
answers.description: There must be a hidden passage somewhere in the corridor. You search diligently, hoping to find a way forward.

answers.title: Retrace Your Steps
answers.description: You decide to retrace your steps and find another path through the temple ruins.

clearing-investigation.exposition: As you investigate the clearing, you discover an ancient altar covered in mysterious symbols. What will you do?

answers.title: Decipher the Symbols
answers.description: The symbols may hold the key to unlocking the secrets of the artifact. You attempt to decipher their meaning.

answers.title: Leave the Clearing
answers.description: You decide to leave the clearing behind and continue your journey through the jungle.

cave-exploration.exposition: As you explore the depths of the cave, you stumble upon a hidden chamber. What will you do?

answers.title: Search the Chamber
answers.description: The chamber may hold valuable treasures or clues to aid you on your quest. You search it thoroughly.

answers.title: Leave the Cave
answers.description: You decide to leave the cave and continue your journey through the jungle.

symbol-decipher.exposition: As you decipher the symbols, a hidden compartment in the altar opens, revealing an ancient scroll. What will you do?

answers.title: Read the Scroll
answers.description: The scroll may contain valuable information about the artifact or its whereabouts. You carefully unfurl it and begin to read.

answers.title: Leave the Altar
answers.description: You decide to leave the altar behind and continue your journey through the jungle.

scroll-revelation.exposition: As you read the scroll, ancient words begin to glow with an ethereal light. Suddenly, you understand their meaning. What will you do?

answers.title: Follow the Instructions
answers.description: The scroll contains instructions that may lead you closer to the artifact. You follow them, eager to uncover its secrets.

answers.title: Ignore the Instructions
answers.description: You decide to ignore the instructions on the scroll and trust your instincts instead.

artifact-discovery.exposition: Following the instructions from the scroll, you journey deeper into the jungle until you stumble upon a hidden chamber. Inside, you find the artifact gleaming with an otherworldly light. What will you do?

answers.title: Claim the Artifact
answers.description: You reach out and claim the artifact, feeling its power coursing through you. But with great power comes great responsibility...

answers.title: Leave the Artifact
answers.description: You hesitate, unsure of the consequences of claiming such a powerful artifact. You decide to leave it behind and continue your journey.

artifact-claim.exposition: As you claim the artifact, the ground begins to shake and the jungle around you comes alive with danger. What will you do?

answers.title: Use the Artifact's Power
answers.description: You harness the power of the artifact to protect yourself and confront the dangers closing in around you.

answers.title: Flee the Chamber
answers.description: The situation is too perilous to risk. You flee the chamber, leaving the artifact behind.

artifact-power.exposition: As you unleash the artifact's power, you feel a surge of energy coursing through you. What will you do?

answers.title: Control the Power
answers.description: You focus your willpower and control the artifact's power, using it to overcome the dangers threatening you.

answers.title: Lose Control
answers.description: The power overwhelms you, spiraling out of control and unleashing chaos upon the jungle. You realize too late the true cost of wielding such power.

victory.exposition: Congratulations! You have successfully claimed the artifact and overcome the dangers of the jungle. What will you do now?

answers.title: Return Home
answers.description: With the artifact in hand, you return home victorious, ready to unlock its secrets and harness its power for the good of humanity.

answers.title: Continue Exploring
answers.description: Your thirst for adventure is unquenchable. You decide to continue exploring, seeking out new mysteries and challenges.

hidden-passage.exposition: After searching diligently, you uncover a hidden passage in the wall of the corridor. What will you do?

answers.title: Enter the Hidden Passage
answers.description: The hidden passage may lead to the heart of the temple or reveal valuable secrets. You enter cautiously.

answers.title: Return to the Main Path
answers.description: You decide not to risk exploring the hidden passage and return to the main path through the temple ruins.

chamber-search.exposition: As you search the chamber, you find a hidden lever concealed behind a pile of rubble. What will you do?

answers.title: Pull the Lever
answers.description: Curiosity piqued, you pull the lever, uncertain of its consequences.

answers.title: Leave the Chamber
answers.description: You decide to leave the chamber behind and continue your journey through the jungle.

lever-pull.exposition: As you pull the lever, the chamber begins to shake, revealing a hidden passage. What will you do?

answers.title: Explore the Passage
answers.description: The newly revealed passage may lead to further discoveries or dangers. You cautiously venture forth.

answers.title: Leave the Chamber
answers.description: You decide to leave the chamber behind and continue your journey through the jungle.

hidden-passage-2.exposition: As you explore the hidden passage, you encounter a series of ancient traps. What will you do?

answers.title: Attempt to Disarm the Traps
answers.description: You carefully attempt to disarm the traps, hoping to proceed safely.

answers.title: Retreat and Find Another Path
answers.description: The traps are too dangerous to risk triggering. You retreat to find another route through the hidden passage.

traps-outcome.exposition: As you attempt to disarm the traps, one of them triggers, sealing off the passage behind you. What will you do?

answers.title: Press Onward
answers.description: Despite the danger, you press onward, determined to reach your goal.

answers.title: Retreat and Regroup
answers.description: The situation is too perilous to continue. You retreat to regroup and find another way.

retreat-regroup-2.exposition: As you retreat and regroup, you stumble upon an ancient map detailing hidden passages within the temple. What will you do?

answers.title: Study the Map
answers.description: The map may hold the key to finding another way to the artifact. You carefully study its details.

answers.title: Continue Exploring
answers.description: You decide to continue exploring the temple ruins, seeking out new paths and discoveries.

map-study.exposition: As you study the map, you decipher a route that bypasses the traps and leads directly to the heart of the temple. What will you do?

answers.title: Follow the Route
answers.description: The mapped route seems promising. You follow it, eager to reach the artifact.

answers.title: Double-Check the Map
answers.description: You decide to double-check the accuracy of the map before proceeding, not wanting to fall into another trap.

map-double-check.exposition: As you double-check the map, you notice a discrepancy in the directions. What will you do?

answers.title: Trust Your Instincts
answers.description: You trust your instincts and follow the route you believe to be correct.

answers.title: Find Another Path
answers.description: You decide not to risk following the potentially incorrect route and search for another path.

end-artifact-search.exposition: Having successfully claimed the artifact, you emerge from the depths of the jungle. What will you do now?

answers.title: Return Home
answers.description: With the artifact in hand, you return home victorious, ready to unlock its secrets and harness its power for the good of humanity.

answers.title: Continue Exploring
answers.description: Your thirst for adventure is unquenchable. You decide to continue exploring, seeking out new mysteries and challenges.

end.exposition: Thank you for playing 'On the Trail of the Lost Artifact'! We hope you enjoyed the adventure. Feel free to start again and explore different paths and outcomes.
